name: Coconut Pineapple Pumpkin Seed Smoothie
description: I got the idea of making ice cubes with coconut milk from the nutritionist Jonny Bowden. You get the welcome coconut flavor, always compatible with pineapple, and the icy texture, but not so much coconut milk that the calories skyrocket.
keywords: coconut milk, orange juice, pineapple, dairy-free, gluten-free, healthy, low cholesterol, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/4 pineapple, peeled, cored and cut into chunks (about 7 ounces / 200 grams)
2 to 3 low-fat coconut milk ice cubes (1 1/2 tablespoons low-fat coconut milk per ice cube)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients except the turmeric in a blender and blend at high speed for a full minute. Pour into a glass, sprinkle with turmeric, and enjoy.
